settings.minititle: SLEEP AS SOUNDLY AS A BABY
settings.title: Royal Deluxe Dream Sheets® 4pc Set
100% Cotton
settings.content: Cotton is soft, durable, and breathable, making it a popular choice for all seasons.

settings.title: Natural Bamboo
settings.content: Bamboo is the softest material, lightweight, and highly breathable, providing maximum comfort and reducing sweating.

settings.title: Exclusive Super Weave
settings.content: Super Weave is a Poly Cotton blend, combining durability and softness. Its crease-resistant feature ensures a smooth finish even after washing.

settings.bonus-gift-content: Find Your Favorite Type Of Bed Sheet

settings.title: Extra Drop That Fit Perfectly Onto Any Bed
settings.content: Sick of tugging and pulling at sheets that don’t easily fit the bed, especially when you have a topper or deep pillow top mattress? Royal Deluxe Dream Sheets™ have up to a 50cm drop so changing the sheets is easy and the fit is perfect!

settings.body: "The sheets are so soft and fresh. Added to the supersleeper pro mattress topper, I am having a much better, more comfortable sleep (especially after recently undergoing 13 hours of major cancer surgery which made getting comfortable a real mission). I highly recommend the mattress topper as well as the sheets."
settings.name: Leanne Z

settings.body: "This is the second time I’ve bought Dream Sheets, they are generous in proportion and luxurious in feel. I’ve decided they are just the thing for the guest room that I rent out on Airbnb. When one of my old sets got stained, I realised I had been using the two I bought for a whole year, and my room is booked most nights, so that is hundreds of washes and the old sets are now my spares in case of accidents."
settings.name: Susan L

settings.body: "Fantastic in every sense of the word! The sheets are an absolute dream to snuggle into & the pillows are the means of the best nights sleep I have experienced in years. The FREE DELIVERY was much appreciated and I must say it made the whole package a great purchase, thank you so much!"
settings.name: Elizabeth B

settings.body: "Best sheets and pillowcases ever. These sheets and pillowcases are hands down the best quality of all time. I just love them and will continue to buy them. Would definitely recommend this product!"
settings.name: Julie H

settings.body: "Great sheets. Love the deep sides that mean I do not have to struggle to make them fit and yet they do not wrinkle in the middle. Wash like a dream. Love, love, love these sheets."
settings.name: Jeanette F

settings.body: "I ordered these four my daughter and son in law as no sheets fitted their bed properly. They said these fit perfectly and feel beautiful to sleep on. I will be ordering some for our bed as soon as I can."
settings.name: Debbie E

settings.title: Best-Selling Bed Sheet Set
settings.content: A 3rd of our life is spent in bed, and one of the essential keys to getting a good night’s sleep is high-quality sheets. With our Royal Deluxe Cotton Sheets, you’ll have luxuriously soft fabric like the bed linens in premium hotels.

settings.title: Non-Toxic Sheets
settings.content: Are You Breathing In Toxic Chemicals Each Night? Don't use cheap sheets that rely on heavy chemicals to stay durable. Rather than breath in those chemicals and potentially cause damage to your health, get yourself sheets that are safe and free from toxic chemicals. The Royal Deluxe Cotton Dream Sheets™ are certified by OEKO-TEX® to guarantee you toxin-free sheets to keep you and your family safe every night.

settings.title: Soft Sateen Weave
settings.content: Sateen woven stitching creates a beautifully soft, lustrous feel while giving your sheets strength to last long lengths of time. Your bed sheets can now have the perfect balance between style, strength, and comfort.

settings.heading: Are cotton sheets good to sleep on?
settings.row_content: Cotton sheets are more breathable and comfortable than any other fabric, leading to a more restful sleep. The Royal Deluxe Breathable Cotton sheets are made with A-grade long cotton fibres which naturally allows the fabric to breathe with your body temperatures.

settings.heading: What is the most comfortable fabric for sheets?
settings.row_content: Cotton is naturally the most breathable and comfortable fabric and allows you to self-regulate your body temperature. The Royal Deluxe Breathable Cotton Sheets use the highest quality natural cotton fibres and give you a comfortable night's sleep, every night.

settings.heading: Are cotton sheets good for your skin?
settings.row_content: Cotton sheets with a high thread count are gentle on the skin since they are a more breathable fibre. The Royal Deluxe Breathable Cotton Sheets use the highest quality A- grade Natural long fibre cotton, making them good for your skin as well as soft and comfortable.

settings.heading: Are bamboo sheets worth the money?
settings.row_content: When it comes to softness and silkiness Bamboo sheets are worth investing in. The Royal Deluxe Natural Bamboo Sheets are softer, cleaner and more cooling than other bed sheets. The Natural Bamboo Dream Sheets even get softer with every wash.

settings.heading: Are bamboo sheets cooler?
settings.row_content: Naturally bamboo is a very breathable fabric and keeps you cool throughout the night. The Royal Deluxe Natural Bamboo Sheets combine comfortable, organic Bamboo fibres with a luxurious sateen weave to keep you cool and comfortable all night, every night.

settings.heading: Are bamboo sheets better than silk?
settings.row_content: Bamboo sheets use cloud-soft fabric that shares the texture and feel of silk, whilst not being as shiny and get softer with every wash.

settings.heading: What kind of sheets do hotels use?
settings.row_content: Hotel Sheets get their soft luxury feel with fine, silky, and lustrous bedding. The Royal Deluxe Super Weave Sheets are recognised as luxury hotel quality, because of the sateen weave used that give them a very soft and comfortable feel.

settings.heading: What is a sateen weave sheet?
settings.row_content: Sateen refers to a weave pattern rather than a material. The Sateen weave technique gives the fabric a richer feel than some other weaves and makes the sheets seem especially luxurious. The Royal Deluxe Super Weave Sheets use a Sateen Weave to ensure a soft and lustrous feel, so comfortable they are recognised as luxury hotel quality.

settings.heading: Why do hotel sheets feel so good?
settings.row_content: Good quality hotel sheets feel beautifully crisp, primarily because of the weave used to make them. The Royal Deluxe Dream Sheets are recognised as luxury hotel quality, thanks to the sateen weave used that give them a very soft, lustrous feel.

settings.title:
Free Delivery
Anywhere In Australia
settings.content: This comes in a box which we’ll deliver to your front door so make sure you have someone around to help you bring it inside. Enjoy free shipping on orders over $150.

settings.title: 30 Night Money Back Guarantee
settings.content: Try it in your own home for 30 nights risk free. If you are not 100% satisfied simply send it back for a full refund of the purchase price.
